languages.text: "Наблюдение за удаленными лесными регионами затруднено ввиду наблюдаемой активности ксеносуществ. Уровень демонстрируемой угрозы — низкий. В Установленные Процедуры были внесены протоколы уклонения от контактов с целью избегания провокаций на агрессию".

"Observation of remote forest regions is difficult due to the activity of xenocreatures. The level of threat shown is low. Protocols for avoiding contact have been introduced into the Standard Procedures in order to avoid provocations of aggression."
languages.original_text: "Наблюдение за удаленными лесными регионами затруднено ввиду наблюдаемой активности ксеносуществ. Уровень демонстрируемой угрозы — низкий. В Установленные Процедуры были внесены протоколы уклонения от контактов с целью избегания провокаций на агрессию".

traits.locale_text: "Observation of remote forest regions is difficult due to the activity of xenos creatures. The level of threat shown is low. Protocols for avoiding contact have been introduced into the Established Procedures in order to avoid provocations of aggression."

"Observation of remote forest regions is difficult due to the activity of xenocreatures. The level of threat shown is low. Protocols for avoiding contact have been introduced into the Standard Procedures in order to avoid provocations of aggression."

"Observation of remote forest regions is difficult due to the activity of xenocreatures. The level of threat shown is low. Protocols for avoiding contact have been introduced into the Standard Procedures in order to avoid provocations of aggression."

"Observation of remote forest regions is difficult due to the activity of xenocreatures. The level of threat shown is low. Protocols for avoiding contact have been introduced into the Standard Procedures in order to avoid provocations of aggression."

languages.text: 「遠隔の森林地域の観察は、異種生物の活動のために難しいです。示される脅威のレベルは低いです。攻撃的な挑発を避けるため、接触回避のプロトコルが標準手順に導入されました」
languages.original_text: "Observation of remote forest regions is difficult due to the activity of xenocreatures. The level of threat shown is low. Protocols for avoiding contact have been introduced into the Standard Procedures in order to avoid provocations of aggression."

traits.locale_text: 「遠隔の森林地域の観察は、異種生物の活動のために難しいです。示される脅威のレベルは低いです。攻撃的な挑発を避けるため、接触回避のプロトコルが標準手順に導入されました」

languages.text: « L'étude des régions boisées les plus reculées de la planète est compliquée par la présence de xéno-créatures. Le niveau de menace est mineur. Des protocoles d'évitement ont été introduits dans les procédures standard afin de limiter tout risque d'agression. »
languages.original_text: "Observation of remote forest regions is difficult due to the activity of xenocreatures. The level of threat shown is low. Protocols for avoiding contact have been introduced into the Standard Procedures in order to avoid provocations of aggression."

traits.locale_text: « L'étude des régions boisées les plus reculées de la planète est compliquée par la présence de xéno-créatures. Le niveau de menace est mineur. Des protocoles d'évitement ont été introduits dans les procédures standard afin de limiter tout risque d'agression. »

languages.text: “由于异形生物的活动，我们很难对偏远的森林地区进行观察。异形生物的威胁程度很低。我们已经在标准程序中加入了避免接触的协议，以免引起对方攻击。”
languages.original_text: "Observation of remote forest regions is difficult due to the activity of xenocreatures. The level of threat shown is low. Protocols for avoiding contact have been introduced into the Standard Procedures in order to avoid provocations of aggression."

traits.locale_text: “由于异形生物的活动，我们很难对偏远的的森林地区进行观察。异形生物的威胁程度很低。我们已经在标准程序中加入了避免接触的协议，以免引起对方攻击。”

languages.text: «La actividad de las xenocriaturas dificulta la observación de las regiones forestales más remotas. El nivel de amenaza que se aprecia es bajo. Se han implementado protocolos de alejamiento en los procedimientos estándar para evitar provocaciones de agresión».
languages.original_text: "Observation of remote forest regions is difficult due to the activity of xenocreatures. The level of threat shown is low. Protocols for avoiding contact have been introduced into the Standard Procedures in order to avoid provocations of aggression."

traits.locale_text: «La actividad de las xenocriaturas dificulta la observación de las regiones forestales más remotas. El nivel de amenaza que se aprecia es bajo. Se han implementado protocolos de alejamiento en los procedimientos estándar para evitar provocaciones de agresión».

languages.text: "Die Beobachtung der abgelegenen Waldgebiete gestaltet sich angesichts der Aktivität der Xenokreaturen schwierig. Die Gefahrenstufe ist niedrig. Protokolle zur Vermeidung von Kontakt wurden in die Standardverfahren aufgenommen, um keine Aggressionen zu provozieren."
languages.original_text: "Observation of remote forest regions is difficult due to the activity of xenocreatures. The level of threat shown is low. Protocols for avoiding contact have been introduced into the Standard Procedures in order to avoid provocations of aggression."

traits.locale_text: "Die Beobachtung der abgelegenen Waldgebiete gestaltet sich angesichts der Aktivität der Xenokreaturen schwierig. Die Gefahrenstufe ist niedrig. Protokolle zur Vermeidung von Kontakt wurden in die Standardverfahren aufgenommen, um keine Aggressionen zu provozieren."

languages.text: "Uzak bölgelerdeki orman alanlarının gözleminde, zeno yaratık mevcudiyeti nedeniyle çeşitli zorluklar yaşanıyor. Belirtilen tehlike seviyesi düşük. Saldırganlığa kışkırtmaktan kaçınmak adına, Standart Prosedürler arasına temastan kaçınılma protokolleri de dâhil edildi."
languages.original_text: "Observation of remote forest regions is difficult due to the activity of xenocreatures. The level of threat shown is low. Protocols for avoiding contact have been introduced into the Standard Procedures in order to avoid provocations of aggression."

traits.locale_text: "Uzak bölgelerdeki orman alanlarının gözleminde, zeno yaratık mevcudiyeti nedeniyle çeşitli zorluklar yaşanıyor. Belirtilen tehlike seviyesi düşük. Saldırganlığa kışkırtmaktan kaçınmak adına, Standart Prosedürler arasına temastan kaçınılma protokolleri de dâhil edildi."
